mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM (select b.ADMIN_NAME,b.ROLE_ID,c.ROLE_NAME,a.LOG_ID,a.ADMIN_ID,a.LOG_OPERATION,a.LOG_STATE,a.LOG_CDATE,rownum R from T_ADMIN B,T_LOG A,T_ROLE C where a.ADMIN_ID=b.ADMIN_ID and B.ROLE_ID=C.ROLE_ID)A WHERE A.R>=#{StartCount} AND A.R<=#{endCount}

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM T_LOG
AND T_LOG.ADMIN_ID in (select admin_id from t_admin where admin_name like '%${adminname}%' )
AND T_LOG.LOG_OPERATION like '%${operation}%'
AND to_char(T_LOG.LOG_CDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY')>='${startdata}'
AND to_char(T_LOG.LOG_CDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY')<='${enddata}'

SELECT S.* FROM(select T_ADMIN.ADMIN_NAME,T_LOG.LOG_ID,T_LOG.ADMIN_ID,T_LOG.LOG_OPERATION,to_char(T_LOG.LOG_CDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as LOG_CDATE,rownum R from T_ADMIN ,T_LOG
T_LOG.ADMIN_ID=T_ADMIN.ADMIN_ID
AND T_LOG.ADMIN_ID in (select admin_id from t_admin where admin_name like '%${adminname}%' )
AND T_LOG.LOG_OPERATION like '%${operation}%'
AND to_char(T_LOG.LOG_CDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY')>='${startdata}'
AND to_char(T_LOG.LOG_CDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY')<='${enddata}'
)S where S.R>=#{StartCount} AND S.R<=#{endCount}
